headline: Why Analysts See the Story Shifting for Packaging Corp as Growth Prospects Improve
summary: The consensus analyst price target for Packaging Corporation of America stock has inched up from $224.20 to $224.90 per share, reflecting a slight increase in optimism from Wall Street. This modest rise comes as analysts debate the company's strengthening demand outlook and recent strategic acquisitions, which are viewed as potential drivers for future growth. Stay tuned to discover how you can continue tracking shifts in analyst sentiment and evolving expectations for the company moving...
